xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR:
Since the format of Cash Flow Statement in XBRL results utility differs from the signed quick results submitted by the Company with Stock Exchanges on October 31, 2022, the reporting of figures in the Cash Flow Statement has been made in line with the quick financial results. Therefore, following re-classification has been made:

1. Adjustments for provisions, current to be read as Adjustments for provisions, current & non-current
2. Adjustments for other financial liabilities, current to be read as Adjustments for other financial & non-financial liabilities, current & non-current
3. Adjustments for other financial assets, current to be read as Adjustments for other financial & non-financial assets, current & non-current.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillNotB: Re-measurement loss on defined benefit plans
Share of other comprehensive income / (loss) of associates and joint ventures
Re-measurement loss on defined benefit plans
Share of other comprehensive income / (loss) of associates and joint ventures
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillBeRe: Net gain / (loss) due to foreign currency translation differences
Net loss on net investment hedge
Net gain / (loss) due to foreign currency translation differences
Net loss on net investment hedge
